page.title: 15INDUSTRY IN COWFOLD.
page.content:
{OAKENDENE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.} Just outside Cowfold on the Bolney Road there is an Industriel Estate which was formely a Calf Rearing Unit.There are many small factories ranging from builders of steam launches to Tool Makers.Other firms are printers,car repairers,boiler makers,cable layers,steelwork fabricators,oil industry suppliers & gas pipe layers.{ {INDUSTRIES IN COWFOLD.} Industries in Cowfold include three garages,one motorcycle shop,a garden furniture manufacturer,fibre glass ponds and canoe maker,aviation suppliers and a garden machinery shop. Fowlers are a very old established building firm.They also construct Swimming Pools.
{
